extendedInfo.description: Are you the trivia master?  Do you have what it takes to make it through a guantlet of 30 trivia questions?  You start with a penny and each time you get a question right that penny doubles, but miss just one and you lose it all.  Sure you can call it quits after each question, and take your money and run.  Or do you have what it takes to risk it all and go, Double or Nothing.
